main event: A military observer reported a sighting of a dim object resembling a star in Newport News, Virginia on August 15, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed moving erratically to the northeast,The object changed brightness during its course, peaking in magnitude just before disappearing,No optical aids were used during the observation,The observation lasted approximately 45 to 90 seconds,The witness had a background in astronomy, which added credibility to the report.
witness description: Arthur L. Corthren, E-5, U.S. Naval Guided Missile School, Dam Neck, Virginia
